events.message:
[consensus] Hard limit on transaction size / decouple from block size limit

Establish a fixed upper limit on serialized transactions, compatible
with existing software.

Decouple transaction size limit from block size limit, by avoiding
derivation of tx limit from block limit.

bitcoin-tx: Decouple max-tx-size from max-block-size

Calculate limits based on tx size limits, not block size limits.
Addition of testnet5.
[qa] p2p-compactblocks, p2p-segwit: update for segwit2x
chainparams: segwit2x deployment on testnet, regtest
[consensus] Decouple max-tx-per-block from max-block-size
[consensus] Forward port BIP102 - 2M block size increase
consensus/consensus.h: unify fork trigger code

[consensus] Add 3-month minimum seasoning requirement for SegWit
before changing base block size.
[consensus] Scale block weight based on base block size
Cleaning up duplicate testnet segwit2x deployment block
net: increase max net msg size to 8mb.

validation: correctly pass `fSegwitSeasoned` to calls in ConnectBlock().

The way `fSegwitSeasoned` is currently passed to `MaxBlockSigopsCost` in
`ConnectBlock` is inconsistent from any other calls, and creates an odd
situation where sigop limits may increase before blocksize limits.

This commit correctly passes in the segwit activation status within
the window of the fork buffer.

[consensus] Remove flag day activation

SegWit+3m remains as the HF trigger.

[mining] Several segwit2x seasoning differential related fixes.

Fixes #28
consensus.h: MAX_BLOCK_VTX warning cleanup
chainparams:  Add segwit2x DNS seeds
init.cpp: add "2x" to uacomment string, for segwit2x
Split hard fork test after segwit activation
Advertise NODE_SEGWIT2X service flag by default.

segwit2x node preferential peering policy

1) Advertise node_segwit2x
2) Prefer to peer with segwit2x and, for now, segwit nodes
3) Option to disable pref peering
Revert disconnection of service bit (1 « 7)
fix gitian name. No rebrand

events.body:
Wrong repo I guess.
Strong concept NACK here.

rename.from: Make Bitcoin Core compatible with NYA segwit2x
